summary.span: 允许用户选择打印机，然后选择要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印的文档的哪些部分。

span.span: Lets users select a printer and choose which sections of the document to print from a Windows Forms application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建的实例时，读/写属性设置为初始值。When you create an instance of , the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 若要获取由用户修改的打印机设置，使用属性。To get printer settings that are modified by the user with the , use the property. 有关使用 Windows 窗体进行打印的详细信息，请参阅命名空间概述。For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the namespace overview. 如果你想要从 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件设置， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to set the , , and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为控件`PrintDialog1`和名为的按钮`Button1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a control named `PrintDialog1` and a button named `Button1`. 此示例需要的按钮事件和事件的`docToPrint`已连接到在此示例中定义的事件处理方法。This example requires that the button's event and the event of `docToPrint` have been connected to the event-handling methods defined in this example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialogExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialogExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialogExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialogExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialogExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialogExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建的实例时，以下的读/写属性设置为初始值。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are set to initial values. |属性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| ||`null`| ||`null`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| 你可以通过属性单独调用这些属性中的任何一个的值。You can change the value for any one of these properties through a separate call to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是对 Windows 2000 和更高版本的 Windows 操作系统有效。This property is valid for Windows 2000 and later versions of Windows operating systems. 在早于 Windows 2000 操作系统上属性不起作用。On operating systems earlier than Windows 2000, the property has no effect.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在运行 [!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)] 或更高版本的系统上，此对话框是否应当以 Windows XP 样式显示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog should be shown in the Windows XP style for systems running [!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)] or later.

value.span: 若要指示此对话框应显示与 Windows XP 样式，否则。

span.span: to indicate the dialog should be shown with the Windows XP style, otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`true`，和将忽略，因为这些属性进行了 Windows 2000 和更高版本的 Windows 已过时。When this property is set to `true`, and will be ignored as these properties were made obsolete for Windows 2000 and later versions of Windows.
